reactor.tcp

Class TcpServer<IN,OUT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • reactor.tcp.TcpServer<IN,OUT>
  • Type Parameters:
    IN - The type that will be received by this server
    OUT - The type that will be sent by this server
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NettyTcpServer

    public abstract class TcpServer<IN,OUT>
extends java.lang.Object
    Base functionality needed by all servers that communicate with clients over TCP.
